name: Infinite Machine
text:
Activate by sending 1 face-up "Empty Machine" in your Spell & Trap Zone to the GY. Once per turn, this face-up card cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects. Once per turn: You can activate 1 of these effects.
● During the Main Phase: Special Summon 1 "Timelord" monster from your hand.
● Target 1 "Timelord" monster in your GY; shuffle it into the Deck, then, you can Set 1 "Infinite Light" from your hand or Deck.
